💻Hacking Tools ​

Tools used for hacking. ​

Note:

  • To learn how to install these tools, go here.
  • I am still adding more tools here, these are just the basics.

Get infomation on someones phone number: ​

Phoneinfoga⭐ ​

This is the best tool to find out infomation about phone numbers. This tool is available for Windows, Linux and MacOS.

Find people across social media via there username: ​

Sherlock ⭐ ​

Sherlock is a command line tool that can search over 50 social media services.

DDoS / DoS Tools ​

1. MHDDoS ⭐ ​

An excellent DDoS / DoS tool. One of the best ones in my opinion.

2. LOIC ​

A decent DoS / DDoS tool that is easy to use and install. Note: This rogram doesn't have malware, it is just flagged as malware because it's a DDoS / DoS tool.

3. XOIC ​

Similar to LOIC.

4. Slowloris ​

A good DDoS / DoS tool.

Other great resources related to hacking and penetration testing: ​

1. Hacking Tools ⭐ ​

A program that has multiple penetration testing tools and hacking tools.

2. Awesome Hacking ⭐ ​

A curated list of a bunch of hacking tools and guides.

Note:

More tools and info will be added here.
